title: Nick Carter and Ellery Queen

content:encoded:
The Numbers Murders from Nick Carter, Master Detective is our first story on Case Closed this week. That episode was originally heard on October 1, 1944.

(30:21) Our second story comes from Ellery Queen. We’ll hear One Diamond, his story from May 6, 1948.

Download CaseClosed692
